website_summaries.verdict: This jacket heats up in seconds, keeps you warm up to 8 hours, and even lets you charge your phone using built-in USB port. Runs extremely small.
pros: 3 carbon fiber heating elements that warm your core
cons: consider ordering a size or 2 larger than usual

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I went to Alaska to go see ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I went to Alaska to go see the glaciers. While on the boat the temperatures dropped and the wind kicked in. I honestly felt nothing!! This jacket kept me warm and toasty. This jacket is worth the buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, works as described, very stylish.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my boyfriend for christmas. He had another previously that was camo, hes not a camo type of guy. He wears this one to job leads (hes a metal roofer) and needs to measure outside. He Loves it!! Brags about it all the time to his buddies and hes never cold with it on. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Streitmater

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: First if you are a large, get extra large! I returned the item. First, the jacket itself is Ok but kinda cheap. It feels like a promotional jacket that would be given away. Why make a heated jacket that’s thin ? Maybe good to wear under another jacket. Charge lasts 4 hours on medium heat. Corny light on the front felt like I was the last surviving member of the Members Only jacket fad.
customer_reviews.author: sensi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Runs small, though
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, came in a day early if I remember correctly. Very fashionable and lightweight, though one would imagine that a heated jacket would be pretty heavy. In Chicagoland weather it doesn't keep me completely warm but I couldn't expect it to in such gruesome temperatures. Warms up in probably 15 seconds. GREAT for keeping warm in a cold house. Once I outgrow this one and it needs to be replaced I'll be coming right back here. -1 star for size inaccuracy, I'm easily a medium and after seeing others reporting that it runs small, decided to order a large. It fits perfectly, so I would DEFINITELY recommend ordering one size above what you actually are.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It fits but is not comfortable. Obviously made for a woman but being sold ...
customer_reviews.text: A large let down here. It fits but is not comfortable. Obviously made for a woman but being sold to men for some reason. Zipper pull on wrong side. Heater worked for a month and quickly cooled down and is barely luke warm. Heater would never restart unless I unplugged the unit from the jacket and plugged it back in. I ran tests on the pack to find a good battery output but very high resistance in the heater coils. I don't believe this batt is a matched unit for the coils. I would need to see the design specs. Anyway the jacket is going to good will and next winter i will be purchasing something much better.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyone

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it again without improvements
customer_reviews.text: The heating pads on the front are not as shown in the pictures, they are strips, about 4x1/2“. Only on the back there is a solid heating pad. The wires inside the jacket are not properly secured, coiled and crossed, they could do a better job at that. The may rip off soon, just because of handling when putting on and taking off the jacket. Overall a bit flimsy, the zipper got stuck numerous times, the elastic band on the waist ripped on one side. The battery is ok and lasts as long as they promise.
customer_reviews.author: Dave1111122222

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He's a size Large but I ordered and XL and it fit him perfectly. We haven't used the heating option but even without it thos jacket keeps him very warm and protects from the wind. I had a little issue with shipping, there was a mix up but after the company was contacted they made it right and went above and beyond to make sure I was still a happy customer. I'm considering buying another one for myself because I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Altomare

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable and keeps your warm
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and really durable + comfortable material, which is as comfortable as my North Face jackets but with heat! I wish there is a way to turn off the led when it's on. 1) It makes you look stupid 2) It gets in your eyes at night because it's quite bright. The battery looks well built but it would have been much better if it uses a USB charger instead of an old school power adapter. It does however have built in USB charging port so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Egan

customer_reviews.title: Made For Tall People
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a couple of opportunities to wear the jacket but this is what I have to say so far...around the torso the large fits me OK, the sleeves, on the other hand, are made for someone with much longer arms...I'm 5'8" and I have the sleeve folded inside about three to four inches. The hood is big and looks awkward, but at my age, I want to be warm I'm done walking the runways and I don't care what others think as long as I'm warm. A couple of cold nights using the jacket heater has proven OK, but really too soon to tell in just a couple of outings. I'll update in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: L and S Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: NO BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: Missing the battery. Seriously, how do you screw this up? a hundred and fifty bucks for a barely comfortable hoodie. I will be returning and ordering from a real company, not some cheap made in china garbage. Edit: I emailed the company and they immediately sent me a battery and charger. The jacket is pretty warm on the maximum setting, but it works best if you’re not moving around much. Battery is kinda heavy, so I hope that translates to long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good quality. Will use for bicycle riding and under-layer for motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the sleeveless vest, but, though comfortable, was too bulky to wear under an outer motorcycle jacket or Aerostich Suit. Ordering an XL, I have a 44 chest, so I either needed to risk a too-snug fit or a slightly loose fit in the XL, so I think the XL works out best for comfort. Having a 37 waist, there is always a decision between 34-36 and 38-40 clothing sizing issues. My height is 5 ' 10", weight 195, 74 years old. The packaging is pro-level, the jacket seems very well made, and, if anything like the vest, will be toasty warm in January. Delivery, of course, was next day. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Norman H. Moore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It's thin enough to wear a hoodie with comfortably but still heavy enough to keep you warm good on its own. The heaters do good at keeping you warm but I myself don't feel the ports "hot spots" on the jacket. Gives me the feeling that I'm not loosing any body heat at all. Even with a backpack on. It won't run you out of it with heat but don't let that sound lacking. So far I've been in 18degree, 2 feet of snow with it and it worked great. *Don't expect it to get super hot* for obvious reasons. But it does very well. Super happy with it. Nice all around style too.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality that stands out in the field
customer_reviews.text: On top of the good quality, ORORO Customer Service is outstanding. It's warm already without the heating and with the heating function on, you can stay out for 2hrs or so without feeling the cold at all. The battery lasted about 2-3 hours with overnight charge. I must mention that Hilary at ORORO Customer Service made this 5 stars rating possible. Always appreciate an Amazon seller stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: So, my boyfriend is a biker and one of the downsides of That is that he freezes on the way to work in the early morning and pretty much any other time it’s not hot. This is a life saver, he loves it. He never would have thought to buy one and it made the perfect gift! It’s kind of like a windbreaker too, so it really keeps the heat in. It’s easy to use and gets really warm. It does run big, be aware. My boyfriend is an XL and it was big on him, so we had to exchange for a large, which fit perfectly! I highly recommend I’ll be getting myself one soon
customer_reviews.author: Haleh Squires

customer_reviews.title: buy it NOW!!! YOU WILL BE HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: best present ever for my wife. heats up quickly and maintains heat. very nice quality jacket as well. everyone is jealous of it even me. the little light on the front does attract attention though. it took us 10 minutes to explain to security at a concert that it was not a recording device. but overall i would highly recommend it for anyone. so far no problems with the battery, it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: spot

customer_reviews.title: Great all around jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. I ordered the size as if it was an ordinary jacket and it has plenty room for sweatshirts and sweaters underneath. I do almost wish I ordered a little smaller though because it’s not an ordinary jacket. The heating elements work so much better when they are pressed up against you. When I where a backpack or sit down my back gets very toasty. I do wish there was a little heat in the arms. Battery life is surprisingly good. I use the battery on a the regular now and it still last a couple days. It’s getting pretty cold though and I may buy an extra battery just in case.
customer_reviews.author: G_Med

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the XXL and it really felt like a XXXL
customer_reviews.text: Everyone says it fits kind of small, I disagree it was a little big. I purchased the XXL and it really felt like a XXXL. Very good in the rain and wind, easily one of the warmest jackets I own. it does have a few cons though the hood looks pretty dumb and fits/feels weird but it can be removed. secondly the jacket must be a little snug for you to feel the difference the jacket makes. All that being said with a temperature of 34, going 50 mph on my motorcycle in some rain I was fairly warm just wearing this and a long sleeve shirt. All and all a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket but battery defect?
customer_reviews.text: Size was a bit too big for me around the arms but I'm not the most proportionate human being. One thing that kind of annoys me is that I can't turn it on more than once while plugged in. Once I turn it off, I have to unplug and plug the battery before turning it on again. For example, when I go into a restaurant, I would turn it off. Once I go out to turn it on, it doesn't. What I do now is go the extra step to unplug the battery from my jacket after being seated and plug it back in before I leave.
customer_reviews.author: cmja25

customer_reviews.title: Well built and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm often outside for work in situations where I'm more of an observer than an active participant, and consequently I'm not that active during those periods so I do not generate a lot of body heat. This heated shell has helped me stay warm while outside in temperatures below freezing, and at the medium setting I haven't run the battery down after ~6 hours use. I'm about 5'7" and bought a large, with the idea that I could wear it over another bulkier layer (like a sweater) and it fits well for that purpose; if I wasn't planning on layering I think a medium would have been the proper size.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: A must have jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket. I love it!!! The only thing I can say is it comes with its own battery and I didn’t know that so I bought an awesome battery pack that I can’t use with it unless I can find an adapter. Not had a change to really test the battery life but that’s about the only negative thing I can say which isn’t that bad. It is high quality and totally worth the price. This coat was packed with such care. It just showed they are proud of their product. I have been using this coat for a while now and it is the best coat I have ever bought!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good jacket for cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: I used in 37 degree weather with two shirts underneath and another sweater on top. It was pretty comfortable for 2 hours on the road on my motorcycle. Have to mention that the motorcycle has plenty of wind deflection, which you won't find an a dirt or crotch rocket, or some road bikes. Mine is a K GTL1600 BMW with heated seats and heated handles. But I rode in that kind of weather before and it was not fun at all. This jacket worked well. It is not too baggy and is water and wind resistant also.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey A.

customer_reviews.title: Jacket is great. Kept me warm enough on a cool morning
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is great. Kept me warm enough on a cool morning. There is only one pocket for the battery. The location of the pocket is not an issue. But the pocket material is rather thin, and its a bit of a tight fit for the battery. The jacket itself is a little stiff, my loosed up a bit after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Guy

customer_reviews.title: My son and I are athletic cut and it fit as described.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Tampa and went to a Cleveland Browns vs Atlanta Falcons football game in Cleveland on November 11th. The temp that day was in the lower 30's and partly cloudy. It was cold for us Floridians. These jackets were life savors. We didn't need the heat until the chill from the concrete in the stadium kicked in. Once I turned on the heat, I was instantly comfortable. If I could have put my feet in my jacket, it would have been even better. Now to figure out how to keep my feet warm too.
customer_reviews.author: frankc

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: This jacket performs as billed. It looks and feels like a normal jacket, but it has the added heat advantage. I purchased a large, and it fit as expected. I've only had the jacket for a week, but I've worn it several times in temperatures as low as 15 F (with wind), and the jacket performed well. The heat feature is subtle which is nice. It doesn't feel artificial if that makes sense. I've had no issues with the battery connection, charge time, or with battery life; all were as described by the company. I would recommend this product. Also. . . get the gloves, too; they're great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: About me: 5" 8' 220-230LBS Jacket Size Large Was worried about fit. I cant get XL to ship to my location but they allowed Large. I took the large size. My normal Jacket size is Large. The fit on this is perfect. The arms are slightly up to my finger tips but i like that. The bottom of jacket hits my belt. Even with our the thing powered it keeps you warm to a slight hot. I hate using 2 jackets so this is perfect when i work in the freezer at work. It hits 30f degree in there so cold. I bought a hand warmer and a balaclava. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Natsume Konno

customer_reviews.title: A must have purchase! Works better than the expensive ones!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket works amazingly! It had better be really cold or you should be on a motorcycle, if you plan to turn on the heater. It's super warm without it even on. I don't even bother with layers anymore this coat is more than enough to defeat cold and super cold weather all by itself. I have not used even half the battery life even once. I use the coat for roughly 8hrs at a time when cycling. I end up only turning it on for a few min then kicking it back off. It retains heat really well. It's also great for charging your phone when out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Get a converter if you are buying a second portable battery
customer_reviews.text: As reference, my boyfriend is 5’7” ~180lbs and the men’s large fits him perfectly. Also, try to buy a size that is not too loose on you, so the heating pad is actually touching you and providing you the most heat. Lastly, this product comes with 1 portable battery. But if you are planning to buy a 2nd one so you can switch them out during the day, or just another one that holds more mAh so it lasts longer, just keep in mind that the wire that connects the jacket to the battery is NOT a USB port. It is a DC port as shown in picture, so keep in mind and make sure to buy a converter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jacket works great
customer_reviews.text: Updating this review from a previous two stars. The battery had died on it's second use, and the customer service team at Ororo (shout out to Jack, thanks so much!) sent out a new battery and charger in less than a week. My husband hasn't had any issues with it. The jacket is warm without the heating unit, the inside of the sleeves are a silky material so they don't get too hot. The hood is detachable, and the small pocket in front is helpful. I would recommend this more for people who do shift work in the cold, as the battery does need to be charged roughly after eight hours of use, depending on light or heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: Niq Sedillo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels good but the battery connector is a constant bother...
customer_reviews.text: It looks well made, feels comfortable and appropriately sized, and even works as promised... BUT NOT RELIABLY. The battery connector comes loose with slight movements, such as during walking and especially when removing a glove from the pocket on the same side, and needs to be constantly pushed back in for a working connection. Durability is unknown at this stage... Follow-up - A replacement battery was offered and accepted. More importantly it came with a new connector and since I've used that even the original battery seems to stay connected! Up-rated to 4 and would happily say 4.5!
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Kalra

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and works well
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big guy (6’5”, 330) and bought the 3XL. It fit perfectly and works great. I used it camping last weekend when temps were in mid to high 30’s and was warm and comfortable the entire time. I’d recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J J KNAUFF

customer_reviews.title: Dont count on it for heat!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great. Product fits great. The heat is so minimal that comes off of it, would have been warmer with another sweatshirt instead. Bought this to experience the Macys Thanksgiving Day Parade. It was frigid and freezing. This jacket did not perform as advertised. The only thing it was useful for was charging my phone once it died.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job keeping me warm!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket heats up quickly and the three different heat levels are great for cold to really cold weather. The shell is easily wiped off and stays dry. The only drawback is that I wish it also heated the lower portion of the front.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective and when I wrote to Lynn @ ORORO Amazon customer service she sent me a reply and asked questions but it was impossible to reply to the email. When I tried to reply to the email it just sent it back to me. When I tried to reply through amazon the option was removed. The answer to Lynn question is that the Jacket never heats up. Yes the battery still haves power when the jacket quits heating because the jacket never heats. When we lay the jacket down flatly it never heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coat, fits fine, looks very nice, comes with a nice battery pack that will also charge devices via the USB port. I live in Michigan and often I am in unheated homes during the winter for work, so I bought the coat after seeing a friend with one. The only negative is the collar won't lay down. I have put books on it at night, rolled it down flat and the collar just stays popped up. It is irritating. The only reason I did not give it 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Searay Boats

customer_reviews.title: Works well and keeps us warm
customer_reviews.text: Have had this jacket for two years. Use it on my motorcycle (under a leather jacket for 55f and below) at outside sporting events and in the snow. It works great. Got one fo my wife and she really likes it too. Went to a ballgame outside in the winter and we’re very comfortable. So far the zippers and jacket overall have held up well. The only strange thing to get used to as a man is the the sipper catch (pull) is on the left, not the right. No big deal. One of my batteries is not working correctly now, thus the 4 stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarplayerbp

customer_reviews.title: Tired of being cold, this jacket is your answer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coat. Easy to adjust temperature. Starts out on high, then automatically goes to low. At 20 degrees, my arms are a touch cool, no heating elements in sleeves. Heating elements on front and back make up for it. Battery has it's own pocket. I love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: stitchnut

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not charge past one dot even after being plugged in for 12 plus hours.
customer_reviews.text: We now tried to charge the battery for a second time. It does not charge past on dot. A few days ago it never charged the full 4 dots. This is not okay. Fits perfect. Large for my husband who is about 165 lbs and 5'10. Nice looking material, good quality. I would like to know how to get a hold of the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Petra B. Moeller

customer_reviews.title: ORORO Men's Soft Shell Heated Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this jacket for a couple of months during the upstate Adirondack winter .. and it has been fantastic! In fact, with just the coat on alone (without the heat) has proven to be super warm. With the heat on ... it warms up quick and I only need it on LOW to be comfortable. I have recommended this coat to various folks who are suffering out in the windy bitter cold.
customer_reviews.author: getabout

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, fit is perfect and it can help keep you warm.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is hardly noticeable in the jacket and doesn’t bother me sitting down. It produces a nice feeling of warmth when worn in chilly weather and the battery does last. I have over 4 hours on medium and some on high I still have plenty of charge left.
customer_reviews.author: David W Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Fit me good when I instally received in the mail and after a couple of washes and lots of usage the only bad thing I can say about the jacket is the external battery component it comes with. It sucks but you cannot compare it to a Milwaukee brand battery pack im going to purchase a newer version of the ororo battery pack and see how that holds up I think itl hold up 2 it's name.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW
customer_reviews.text: This jacket exceeded all my expectations. I bought it for my husband, who works outside year round. The battery life is amazing, and it gets really warm (theres even 3 heat settings to choose from, or you can turn off the heat and itll stay warm for awhile). It held up keeping him warm and dry through 10 hour shifts in 39 degree, pouring rain. It also held up in the middle of Montana winter! Theres absolutely nothing negative about this coat and its well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Barely heats up even on highest setting
customer_reviews.text: It was 50 degrees Even on the highest setting it didn’t keep me warm I’m returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Customer 2009

customer_reviews.title: Size may be too small, problems with missing components
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a medium shirt, but we had to return the large size of this item and get an XL. That fits fine. But, the company needs to be more careful in its packaging. I had to return the first XL because the battery was not enclosed. When I got the replacement, the cord for the charger was not enclosed. Between the two, I finally had the full kit. Also, and this is my bad, I did not realize that this jacket does not have heated pockets, as some of the other brands do. We haven't actually tried the jacket yet, I may yet return it for a brand with heated pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fails in its raison dêtre
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - well built - the black looks nice and not bulky, almost slim fit - inexpensive Cons: - Heat is not that effective. I was wearing a light cotton shirt and barely felt any heat at maximum setting, oh, also it doesn't heat up that fast. I was underwhelmed in short. - tight around the shoulders and hurts my elbows. This renders the jacket rather uncomfortable. May work for some people but a bust for me as it fails in its raison dêtre.
customer_reviews.author: B100

customer_reviews.title: Best coat ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving one for Christmas myself I knew it would be the perfect gift for my elderly father who lives in New Jersey. I love that I can choose 3 levels of heat. The coat itself is super warm even without the heat. The battery lasts all day long. I usually get 4-6 hours out of a full charge. And the battery can be used to charge your phone too. Love love love this coat!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandojerm

customer_reviews.title: Watch which size you buy. Works well with little activity of movement.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to keep me warm in a deer stand and it works ok for about 6 hours on medium. I believed some of the other reviews and purchased a size larger (xl) and should have purchased large. I'm 6'3" and 210 lbs, extra large is big on me.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman in nc

customer_reviews.title: It will warm you up!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat for my brother and he LOVES it. It heats fast, the coat itself is of great quality. It’s made well and is very good looking coat. My brother is a 3X and it fit him true to size. It is a great price! My sons had bought another name brand (known for tools) and twice the money and this one works and looks better and half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jacket for watching my son play Friday night football games. Worn 3 times and heater stopped- tried to return and missed return window by 3 days. Jacket itself well made heater not.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Heat and warm but not waterproof/not all weather
customer_reviews.text: As a contractor I stay outdoor most of the time and demand a heated jacket during cold winter. After a month of experience, this is a good jacket with the heating features. However, it is not that water proof as it said. The material might waterproof at some point, but the seam is not waterproof. So, you can't wear it during rain, might not be snowing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tall sister

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket.  Take your time figuring it out.
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my very outdoorsy husband who never lets wind or cold weather keep him indoors. He loves it. It didn't come with any written instructions about using the battery pack, so it took a bit of time to get clear about that -- but the jacket does exactly what it said it would do in the online description ... and, as a bonus, it looks great. Very sharp. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: cary anne spear

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband had chemotherapy and he gets cold easily since. He wears his coat all the time. It was perfect underneath his skiing jacket. He where is it in the fall and spring if your feelings like everywhere. The temperature is just right. One of the best gift I think I've ever purchased for him!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries will not last even 4 hours. Do not have 10 hour life.
customer_reviews.text: I work outside in construction. I purchased 3 of these jackets for myself and a couple coworkers. The battery last no longer than 4 hours. Im looking to purchase 3 batteries to get us through the day but they are $69 each. What a joke!!!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Ramos

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for the Right Price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Fiancé for Christmas because he is always cold. He absolutely loves it! It is pretty stylish and keeps him warm for several hours when we are out and about. The button/logo above the Ororo symbol is what turns it on/off and you can also set it to low, medium or high heat. The battery is rechargeable and obviously just ensure you read the care instructions. Will definitely consider purchasing one for myself in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole, LVT

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat. More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had buyers remorse when purchasing this coat. After the first night at work that remorse quickly went away. I work in and out of the weather at a cold warehouse moving trailers and this coat is perfect. I rarely need the coat turned on due to how warm the coat is already. I recommend this coat to anybody. P.S. I wash this coat every 2 to 3 days and still haven't had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket. Great customer service. I ordered a Large, which fit a little too big. I exchanged it for a medium (had to pay for shipping) customer service was great and sent me a replacement as soon as they received my package. I wish the lower setting was a little warmer and so on but it does the job. I definitely want to buy a back up battery. Having two makes it easier to keep it on high mode if you’re working outside all day. I recommend 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Hero_of_time_XX

customer_reviews.title: He says sometimes it bangs into his hip and can be annoying. Also
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my son. Absolutely loves it, only complaint is the battery placement. He says sometimes it bangs into his hip and can be annoying. Also, if he places his phone in the pocket near by, they clack together some. He has some coworkers that are looking at buying some now though. He says it is possibly the best gift ever. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: RLK

customer_reviews.title: Love it but doesn't stay charged as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Even when it's around freezing outside, I often don't need it on the highest setting. I'm glad I purchased it. I am finding that even though I use it for short amounts of time, you should probably charge it every night so you don't run out of heat when you need it most. It uses a USB type C port for charging. If that's what your phone uses you can use it's charger as well as the one it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Needs replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jacket the first day i received it- very warm (when it works) and stylish. It was a little too short in the arms so i gave it to my wife because it seemed of good quality at first. The past couple kf weeks, the coat kept randomly turning off and we couldnt figure out why. we have now discovered the battery outlet is the issue and it will be $60 for a replacement battery! The battery itself has a bad socket and will not keep the power connection even though it is fully charged. Do not buy unless you want to replace parts!
customer_reviews.author: imnicko

customer_reviews.title: Some what a great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Some what a great jacket to warm you up. Has three levels to warm you up, but does not last long on the highest level about close to 3 hours. The lowest setting last more longer like 10 hours but not that warm if out in the cold weather like say 37 degrees. Also not that warm for me had to wear another jacket to keep the warm from escaping. For something this expensive not that great if I have to wear another jacket over it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter
customer_reviews.text: I live in a cold winter area, and this jacket is the best purchase I've made. I just wish I bought it earlier!! It feels like walking around with the warmth of heated car seats. For the same price as a regular jacket, this is definitely a great value. It's made walking my dog fun again. Only downsides: The sleeves are really long, so my hands are entirely covered. The battery pack is a bit heavy and noticeable in the jacket. Not as wind resistant as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: A little loose in the chest/back area.
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad; I ordered an XL and while I liked the length, I feel that the chest could have been a little tighter since the heating elements are in the chest and back. May revise this review when it gets colder and if it works great or if it gets worse. The heating element and the battery seem to work well when I did go outside, so the product does produce as advertise.
customer_reviews.author: jfawver

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my husband for christmas and he loved it! He works construction so he is outside all day in the cold weather during the winter months he has been complaining of being freezing when he gets home..he opened this gift and used it the next day..we charged it overnight as instructed and he said it kept him warm all day for thr full 12 hours he worked and that his fellow coworkers said they will buy one themselves! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool jacket and great icebreaker.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small, but I listened to the reviews and ordered a XL instead of a large. It's true the zipper is on the opposite side like a woman's jacket, but it doesn't matter really. For the price compared to others it is worth it as this jacket will draw eyes to you in a crowded street or room.
customer_reviews.author: Mirrorwolf

customer_reviews.title: Battery only charges 50%
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is fine I love it. But unfortunately I received a battery with it that only charges to 50%. I emailed back and forth for a few days we reassured I would be receiving a new one in the mail in 3-7 business days. Well that was over 2 weeks ago and I have yet to see any new battery. I wanted to recommend but hard after the rough experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Haffey

customer_reviews.title: works great! Used it for months and battery hold change ...
customer_reviews.text: works great! Used it for months and battery hold change well. Only complaint is the little pocket inside the battery pouch is too small to hold battery, so it makes the pouch sag a bit. Looks like battery was upgraded to a larger size, but the pocket in the pouch is still for a smaller battery.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: This was much better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was much better quality than I expected, close to NorthFace jackets I own! The fit is precise, I wish I had gotten a Medium since I usually wear a Medium but I bought a large being conservative. It looks sharp and keeps warm. The temp button makes it easy to adjust for when I am indoors or out, stopped or moving. I would buy this again just wish they had gloves that were heated too.
customer_reviews.author: AH20z

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but can be pain in the neck
customer_reviews.text: Jacket does warm well, for a few hours on high as advertised. Overall the jacket feels stiff though and the collar won't stay away from your neck when you zip it down a little like most jackets will. The jacket does have adjustable waste chords at the bottom for a snug fit if needed. This was a pleasant surprise as I didn't see it mentioned in the product description. The outer chest zipper pocket is big enough to hold my large Samsung galaxy phone which is handy, no internal pockets though which would be nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The mail never stops. It comes with the sun, rain, winds and winter. I bought this for my daughter. She delivers mail all day long with the window open. I appreciated the soft shell and the warmth she'd experience. There's no better way to say I love you than to give someone warmth and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: CindyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Battery is worthless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket six months ago. Only used it obce. The jacket only felt good at it's highest setting. The jacket itself feel and fits good. I wanted to start using it again. Now that it's getting colder in the mornings. But the battery doesn't work anymore. This is ridiculous given the fact that I only used it once before. Also to replace the battery you'll just have to pay an additional $70. If it wasn't for the battery being worthless. I would have given 5 stars. I have recently contacted ororo customer service. They are sending me a new battery for free. 5 stars great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The battery didn't charge the phone from the usb. I didn't care much. It turns off right after turning on fully charged battery which doesn't serve the purpose. I bought it last year, and I have been telling people good things about it. I don't know where to go from here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hockey arena home run!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas to keep him warm in the Connecticut hockey arenas. He loves it!! Any hockey parent knows how cold they can be and he said he was the warmest he has ever been. He is normally a large but ordered an extra large and it’s perfect. Home run!
customer_reviews.author: AmyintheAtl

customer_reviews.title: roasty toasty
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift and they love it. Keeps them warm while snow blowing and staying the cars.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Ottaviani

customer_reviews.title: Tree service use
customer_reviews.text: I work outside on trees all day and in the cold and sometimes rain...to be honest,this repels rain but not for long,I feel I need to really let it dry after a day of use because it feels damp inside.overall,a nice looking jacket that you can wear anywhere.im pretty sure it'll serve its purpose if you don't use it for work but for me it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: A little to improve on !!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. 2 things about the coat need improvement. QC, The sleeve on the inside is torn open about 6 inches and the sleeves are a little to long. I am avg. build so everything usually fits good. Despite the down fall I had. I told my co worker into buying 2 jackets. Sleeves are 2 long on him too. His wife jacket fit good.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This item fits probably one size up from what the sheet says to you. I used it during deer hunting opener in Minnesota. It is nice and warm and will keep you cozy in your stand. The goal is not to fall alseep Sense it can be that toasty. The only thing is you should find a way to buy a second battery for this. On high it really only lasts a couple hours. And when your out in the rain and a open grove at 6:00 am. It’s still pretty chilly
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: this jacket is of very high quality good zippers nice size pockets fit is nice i wear xxl pretty actually close got on black friday which made it a greater value my only concern would be for security scans as the coat has a battery and heating elements through out
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Used dirty jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box to find a dirty used jacket, no charger no battery there was hair and has stains. Unbelievable how much i paid for something that obviously was returned from someone else and not even checked re sold.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit I will exchange it. My fault for getting the measurements wrong. You want this to be a little snug on the body. It works well even if it's not but a good for is important! Great quality and very durable! It's very warm even without the heater.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyJam333

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket and does as expected. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the heating elements in the back are near the top and would be much better if they were lower to help heat all over. Build quality is great and battery lasts as advertised. I normally use size 3X so it's a bit tight in the arm pits in front but is a good fit everywhere else. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley

customer_reviews.title: its perfect
customer_reviews.text: well it's warm, at least in florida it is, hoping it will do the job in nov/dec when I go north. will update afterward, very nice jacket, even warm without the heater on. I got a man style, because I hate fitted tight jackets, the mens large was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my son who is a letter ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son who is a letter carrier as a gift--he says that worn under a larger sweatshirt or light jacket it really does the trick. I also invested in another battery for it, as he is in the weather 6-7 hours a day, and one battery won't work that long. He says he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and well made, with heavy material. Ordered a Medium and sleeve length was perfect for a 6 foot guy, who weighs 160 pounds. I just wish it was a little snugger in the waist area, since I have a 32 inch waist. It does have strings to pull it in around the waist though. Hoody zipper does hide, when hoody is removed.
customer_reviews.author: RB Tucson, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Warrant Reaponse.. what’s that?
customer_reviews.text: I would be able to give a 4 or 5 star rating if the company would respond to a warranty issue. The jacket keeps me warm, the battery lasts the stated time but if I turn off the jacket and then try to turn it back on, it won’t. I have to unplug the battery to reset it and then it will work again. I have attempted three separate times through their website to get help and have received no response. My problem is just frustrating and I’ll make it work. What happens when a buyer gets a jacket that fails completely? You will be on your own
customer_reviews.author: John Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very quality materials and fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a electric jacket as I am in and out of doors a lot. I wanted something I didn't have to take off when indoors, but warm enough for out of doors. I have not used it "in production" though fit, warmth and initial testing is great. The battery pack is small and not noticeable. The jacket has great features to keep your heat in around the sleeves and waist. It is professional looking, I am just steeling myself for the comments of a glowing button on my chest :)
customer_reviews.author: Thorjeep.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Used the guide for fitting suggestions and the fit is perfect. The hood does have extra height to it, so you will have to use the cinch cords to keep it down in windy conditions. The jacket is very warm and cozy as soon as you put it on, the heating elements warm up very quickly and the battery life is great. The placement of the battery in the jacket is not an issue and charging it is easy maintenance as with any battery reliant product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: Warmest jacket I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The cold has been bothering me more this year then in years past. This is the warmest jacket I've ever owned. It blocks the wind, the heating goes to high initially to warm you up fast and then goes to a warm setting, to keep you warm without getting too hot. I love this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Curryfiend

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes
customer_reviews.text: When my husband took this out of the bag you could tell it was great quality, looks fantastic, fit great, my husband is 5'11 220lbs I ordered a 2xl, we haven't tried to charge it yet and use the heating element, once we do I'll give a follow up and maybe 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nora russo

customer_reviews.title: It will help keep you warm.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe mine is defective or maybe it's fine. For some reason I was expecting this coat to warm me up but all I've noticed so far it helps keep me warm when it's 10 degrees F outside.. It is a fine coat and the heating pads do help. Looking forward to this coat helping out when I hunt for Norther Lights in the middle of the night during winter. I would gladly get another.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Olin

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you are in cold for any period of time. Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I didn't get one of these sooner! Always at Ice rink with son who plays. Some rinks are just too cold, need to hide in warm room. This jacket is awesome. Looks great, quality is great. People always asking why there's a light on the front and when I tell them "it's heated", they're surprised and want to know where I got it. Battery is not too heavy and also has USB charger to charge a phone. Great product and price is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack died in a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: Battery pack stop being charged. It is empty however it shows 4 leds. Company needs to explain the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tx

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the heat
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket, fits really well and the fleece lining on the inside is lovely. I usually take the hood off but with some recent rains I decided to try it. It held up ok in pouring rain, I stayed warm and I left it to dry on its on. Took about 2 days since I was very hesitant to toss it in the dryer. Still unsure how I’m gonna clean it at some point but until then, I’m content
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who absolutely loves it. I think his heart will break once summer gets here. This is a warm light coat by nature and the heating element turns things up a notch when needed. The coat has 3 heating temps. The battery can easily be recharged and is not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Tot

customer_reviews.title: Best Heated Bang 4 Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is heated jacket is probably one of the most affordable on the market. I have used this throughout the winter and would recommend this to anyone. They do run snug but that’s how the jacket is made to retain the heat. The battery lasts me all day and I work outside a lot at an auto auction. Rain, or snow this jacket gets it done. It’s definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Seems well made. I feel the battery life is not good. I wear mine back and forth to work. Its on about a half hour there. Same back and it’s dead in two days. Plus I believe the charger is a different shape so you have to use the one you get not any micro usb.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rantz

customer_reviews.title: It is very warm
customer_reviews.text: I like this coat. Unlike(older) other heated jackets it is easy to clean. The price is right and I receive at lot of compliments when I wear it. The battery last all day on low and it is still enough to keep me warm. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David M Long

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: Works well, looks good, keeps you comfy down into the 30s. Single digits it's not very helpful outside or at least you can't feel it, but that is when its almost 0 degree with windchill. Normal circumstances it's going to keep ya happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: They really thought of everything. The jacket fits great. It's not too heavy to wear in mildly cold conditions, but the warmer makes it perfect for really cold conditions. I can't wait to wear this jacket from November through February or March and not have to switch between 3 different jackets depending on the temperature or month. I'm recommending this jacket to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1 about 210lbs, average built. Ordered a large the first time around, but it was way to small and really tight around the arms and chest. I returned the large and ordered an XL, but still was a bit small in the arm sleeves and arm pits. Before returning the XL I debated on keeping it because it fit ok with a t-shirt on, but I knew it would be uncomfortable with a thicker long sleeve shirt under the jacket. I ended up with a XXL jacket and it fits perfectly. Definitely order a size up or 2 then what you're use to with this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ina

customer_reviews.title: ororo Men's Soft Shell Heated Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. The first jacket I received had a problem that the stitching on the inner arm came undone. The seller promptly fixed the issue! The jacket is warm without power and quickly becomes even warmer with the power on. It heats fast and lasts a pretty long time on one charge. The fit was accurate American sizing and my zipper was on the correct side for a men's jacket. The only complaint is that the inner lining is thin and I am worried that mine will rip in the future. I read almost every review and was slightly worried paying the money but glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat with a great feel of quality.
customer_reviews.text: The coat size fit perfectly. The quality feels great. The coat heats up quick, and feels nice. I have a trip to Quebec City Canada at the end of January, and this is the reason for the purchase. I'll leave another review on the true functionality of the coat when I return from the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

product_meta.title: ORORO Men's Soft Shell Heated Jacket with Detachable Hood and Battery Pack
feature_bullets: 100% Polyester; Model is 6'2" and wearing a size medium

NEAT AND TAILORED DESIGN WITH DURABLE FABRIC: Softshell fabric exterior with breathable linning ensures you don't lose any excess heat and enjoy comfortable warmth; Detachable hood is specially designed for chilly mornings and extra protection on windy days; Water and wind resistance for your unrestricted movement towards outdoor

HEAT ACROSS BODY: 3 carbon fiber heating elements generate heat across core body areas (left & right chest, mid-back); Adjust 3 heating settings (High, medium, low) with just a simple press of the button
QUICK AND LONG-LASTING WARMTH: Heat quickly in seconds with 7.4V UL/CE-certified battery; Up to 10 working hours; USB port for charging smartphones and other mobile devices
FOR ALL WALKS OF LIFE AND ADVENTURES: Ideal and warm choice for you, family members, friends, employees, to enjoy outdoor activities
Easy care: Machine washable; The heating elements and jacket construction are designed to endure 50+ machine wash cycles
